name: research-assistant-cskill
description: Academic research assistant for literature search, paper analysis, summarization, and citation management. Search academic databases, analyze papers, generate summaries, and manage citations effortlessly.
author: Claude Code
when_to_use: Search for academic papers on a specific topic
Analyze and extract key findings from papers
Create citations in APA, MLA, Chicago, or BibTeX format
Find papers that cite a specific paper
Manage bibliography and citations for research projects
when_not_to_use: General coding questions not related to research
Personal tasks unrelated to academic research
Searching for non-scholarly websites or content
Questions about how to use this skill
example_queries: Search for papers on machine learning in healthcare
Find recent research about transformer models
Analyze this paper and extract key findings
Generate APA citation for this paper
Create a literature review on AI ethics
What methodology does this paper use?
Find papers that cite this DOI
Summarize the main contributions of this research
Generate BibTeX entry for this paper
Search for open-access papers on climate change
Identify the most influential papers in computer vision
Find research papers by author name
